comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kasuteru>@kasuteru</denchmark-link> Can you check "Deploy to Azure" button on this page - <denchmark-link:https://github.com/heartexlabs/label-studio/tree/release/0.7.5>https://github.com/heartexlabs/label-studio/tree/release/0.7.5</denchmark-link> ? Hi, sorry I was not able to check since I am on vacation. Will let you know if any problems arise.
